settings.name: Animal Type
settings.description: Primary movement mode of the animal. This affects how terrain and water are treated during walk generation.

settings.name: Behaviour Towards Water (Terrestrial)
settings.description: Defines how water bodies are treated for TERRESTRIAL animals. Ignored for AIRBORNE and MARINE animals (water is treated like normal terrain).

options.displayText: Avoids water completely (cannot cross water bodies)
Avoids water whenever possible, but allows starting or isolated points in water
Water is treated like any other terrain (can cross)

settings.name: Walk Unit Length (metres)
settings.description: Defines the smallest possible step length used in the generated walks. This value represents the fundamental unit length of the walk.

settings.name: Movement Policy
settings.description: Defines how the number of steps and step timing are determined.

settings.name: Time Step (seconds)
settings.description: Time difference between consecutive steps. Only used if Movement Policy is set to 'Fixed time step'.

settings.name: Number of Steps
settings.description: Total number of steps generated per trajectory. Only used if Movement Policy is set to 'Fixed number of steps'.

settings.name: Reference Speed (m/s)
settings.description: Typical movement speed of the animal used to automatically determine step count and timing. Only used if Movement Policy is set to 'Automatic (based on reference speed)'.

settings.name: Delta-T Tolerance Factor
settings.description: Threshold to decide whether two records belong to the same trajectory. A value of 2.0 allows deviations up to twice the median Î”t.
